citation: Proclamation under the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Act 2019 fix 1 February 2021 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

22 December 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 December 2020

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
